title: Royal Scots Greys
description: For almost three centuries the Royal Scots Greys have had the proud distinction of being ScolandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s only regular cavalry regiment, famed for their distinguished service record from MarlboroughÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s wars to World War II. Indeed, the Greys at Waterloo form one of the most memorable features of military history. With their cry of Ã¢â‚¬ËœScotland forever!Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ they charged upon the French ranks seizing the imperial eagle of the French 45th Regimental.
